item.title: UNIFIRST CORP 10-K
item.description: UNIFIRST CORP, which is in the Services-Personal Services [7200] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 26, 2022 had 29402 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 407 instances 2022 - 314 instances fiscal - 270 instances financial - 265 instances august - 247 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
